constants.name: em_coupling_quantity_identifier
constants.header: Physical quantity described in the user-defined em_coupling matrix

int.name: b_field
int.description: Magnetic field, in the direction set by each target of the coupling matrix

int.name: db_field_x_dx
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field X component along the X coordinate

int.name: db_field_x_dy
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field X component along the Y coordinate

int.name: db_field_x_dz
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field X component along the Z coordinate

int.name: db_field_y_dx
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field Y component along the X coordinate

int.name: db_field_y_dy
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field Y component along the Y coordinate

int.name: db_field_y_dz
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field Y component along the Z coordinate

int.name: db_field_z_dx
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field Z component along the X coordinate

int.name: db_field_z_dy
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field Z component along the Y coordinate

int.name: db_field_z_dz
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field Z component along the Z coordinate

int.name: db_field_r_dr
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field major radius component along the major radius coordinate

int.name: db_field_r_dz
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field major radius component along the Z coordinate

int.name: db_field_z_dr
int.description: Gradient of magnetic field Z component along the major radius coordinate
